select lp.shopId as shopId,lp.shopname as shopName,lp.bj_yt as shopYt,decode(nvl(b.xsje,0),0,0,1) as kbType, a.xsje,b.xsje as xsjeTq , TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(b.xsje,0,0,(a.xsje-b.xsje)/b.xsje)*100,2), 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as xszz, a.xsbs as jybs,b.xsbs as jybsTq, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(b.xsbs,0,0,(a.xsbs-b.xsbs)/b.xsbs)*100,2), 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as jybsZz , a.kll,b.kll as kllTq, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(b.kll,0,0,(a.kll-b.kll)/b.kll)*100,2), 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as kllZz, a.kdj,b.kdj as kdjTq, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(b.kdj,0,0,(a.kdj-b.kdj)/b.kdj)*100,2), 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as kdjZz from lp_bi_shop lp left join (select shopId, shopName,sum(xsje) as xsje,sum(xsbs) as xsbs,sum(kll) as kll,round(decode(sum(xsbs),0,0,sum(xsje)*10000/sum(xsbs)),2) as kdj from ZH_MD_TBZS where rq between to_date('${startTime}','yyyymmdd') and to_date('${endTime}','yyyymmdd') group by shopId,shopName) a ON lp.shopid = a.shopid LEFT JOIN (select shopId,sum(xsje) as xsje,sum(xsbs) as xsbs,sum(kll) as kll, round(decode(sum(xsbs),0,0,sum(xsje)*10000/sum(xsbs)),2) as kdj from ZH_MD_TBZS where rq between to_date('${startTimedb}','yyyymmdd') and to_date('${endTimedb}','yyyymmdd') group by shopId) b ON a.shopId = b.shopId Where lp.bj_bd = 0
AND lp.shopid IN (${shopId})

select.if:
select a.shopId,a.shopName,a.yt,a.sq,a.xsje,a.gmv,a.hyxs,a.kll,a.xsbs,a.mll, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(b.xsjedb,0,0,(a.xsje-b.xsjedb)/b.xsjedb *100 ),2) , 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as xsjekbRate
, a.dcRate
from (SELECT b.shopid as shopId,b.shopname as shopName,b.bj_yt as yt,b.sq as sq,sum(a.xsje) as xsje, round((nvl(sum(c.xsje),0)+nvl(sum(d.xsje),0)+nvl(sum(e.xsje),0)+ nvl(sum(f.xsje),0))/10000,2) as gmv, sum(a.hyxs) as hyxs,sum(a.kll) as kll,sum(a.xsbs) as xsbs, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(sum(a.xsje),0,0,sum(a.xsml)/ sum(a.xsje) *100 ),2) , 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as mll
, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(sum(xsjh),0,0,sum(a.xsje)/ sum(xsjh) *100 ),2), 'fm9999990.0999') || '%' as dcRate
FROM ZH_MD_TBZS a LEFT JOIN lp_bi_shop b ON a.shopid = b.shopid
LEFT JOIN (select d.shopid,d.shopname,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from THREE_SALE a,shopdef b,malldef c,lp_bi_shop d where a.shopid = b.id and b.mallid = c.id and c.code = d.ebs_mcid group by d.shopid,d.shopname,a.jzrq ) c ON c.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = c.rq
LEFT JOIN (select e.shopid,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from SALE a,skt b,shopdef c,malldef d ,lp_bi_shop e where a.sktno = b.sktno and b.shopid = c.id and c.mallid = d.id and d.code = e.ebs_mcid group by a.jzrq,e.shopid ) d ON d.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = d.rq
LEFT JOIN (select e.shopid,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from his_sale a,skt b,shopdef c,malldef d ,lp_bi_shop e where a.sktno = b.sktno and b.shopid = c.id and c.mallid = d.id and d.code = e.ebs_mcid group by a.jzrq,e.shopid ) e ON e.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = e.rq
LEFT JOIN ( select d.shopid,sum(a.amount) as xsje,a.rq from INPUTSALE a,shopdef b,malldef c,lp_bi_shop d where a.shopid = b.id and b.mallid = c.id and c.code = d.ebs_mcid and status = 1 group by d.shopid,a.rq ) f ON f.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = f.rq
WHERE 1=1
and a.shopId in (${shopId})
and a.rq between to_date(#{startTime},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyymmdd')
group by b.shopid ,b.shopname,b.bj_yt,b.sq)a left join ( SELECT sum(xsje) as xsjedb, shopid FROM ZH_MD_TBZS where rq between to_date(#{startTimedb}, 'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{endTimedb}, 'yyyymmdd') group by shopid ) b ON a.shopid = b.shopid

SELECT b.shopid as shopId,b.shopname as shopName,b.bj_yt as yt,b.sq as sq,sum(a.xsje) as xsje, round((nvl(sum(c.xsje),0)+nvl(sum(d.xsje),0)+nvl(sum(e.xsje),0)+ nvl(sum(f.xsje),0))/10000,2) as gmv, sum(a.hyxs) as hyxs,sum(a.kll) as kll,sum(a.xsbs) as xsbs, to_char(a.rq,'${timeType}') as zfrq , TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(sum(a.xsje_kb),0,0,(sum(a.xsje)-sum(a.xsje_kb))/ sum(a.xsje_kb) *100 ),2), 'fm9999990.0999') || '%' as xsjekbRate , TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(sum(a.xsje),0,0,sum(a.xsml)/ sum(a.xsje) *100 ),2) , 'fm9999990.0999')|| '%' as mll
, TO_CHAR(ROUND(decode(sum(xsjh),0,0,sum(a.xsje)/ sum(xsjh) *100 ),2), 'fm9999990.0999') || '%' as dcRate
FROM ZH_MD_TBZS a LEFT JOIN lp_bi_shop b ON a.shopid = b.shopid
LEFT JOIN (select d.shopid,d.shopname,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from THREE_SALE a,shopdef b,malldef c,lp_bi_shop d where a.shopid = b.id and b.mallid = c.id and c.code = d.ebs_mcid group by d.shopid,d.shopname,a.jzrq ) c ON c.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = c.rq
LEFT JOIN (select e.shopid,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from SALE a,skt b,shopdef c,malldef d ,lp_bi_shop e where a.sktno = b.sktno and b.shopid = c.id and c.mallid = d.id and d.code = e.ebs_mcid group by a.jzrq,e.shopid ) d ON d.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = d.rq
LEFT JOIN (select e.shopid,sum(a.xsje) as xsje,a.jzrq as rq from his_sale a,skt b,shopdef c,malldef d ,lp_bi_shop e where a.sktno = b.sktno and b.shopid = c.id and c.mallid = d.id and d.code = e.ebs_mcid group by a.jzrq,e.shopid ) e ON e.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = e.rq
LEFT JOIN ( select d.shopid,sum(a.amount) as xsje,a.rq from INPUTSALE a,shopdef b,malldef c,lp_bi_shop d where a.shopid = b.id and b.mallid = c.id and c.code = d.ebs_mcid and status = 1 group by d.shopid,a.rq ) f ON f.shopid = a.shopid and a.rq = f.rq WHERE 1=1
and a.shopId in (${shopId})
and a.rq between to_date(#{startTime},'yyyymmdd') and to_date(#{endTime},'yyyymmdd')
group by to_char(a.rq,'${timeType}'),b.shopid ,b.shopname,b.bj_yt,b.sq order by zfrq ,xsje desc
